00027 require_once dirname(__FILE__).'/inc/config.inc.php';
00028 require_once dirname(__FILE__).'/inc/ApiPrint.class.php';
00029 require_once dirname(__FILE__).'/inc/ApiPrintUser.class.php';
00030 require_once dirname(__FILE__).'/inc/ApiPrintResponse.class.php';
00031 
00032 // Prepare response
00033 $response = new ApiPrintResponse();
00034 
00035 // Check headers
00036 if (isset($_SERVER['HTTP_X_API_EMAIL']) === false || isset($_SERVER['HTTP_X_API_TOKEN']) === false) {
00037   $response->sendCallError();
00038 }
00039 
00040 try {
00041   // Get the user
00042   $api_user = ApiPrintUser::retrieveByEmailAndKey($_SERVER['HTTP_X_API_EMAIL'], $_SERVER['HTTP_X_API_TOKEN']);
00043   if ($api_user === null) {
00044     $response->sendLoginError();
00045   }
00046   
00047   // Check URL or HTML content
00048   $md5 = null;
00049   $url = null;
00050   $content = null;
00051   $options = array();
00052   
00053   if (isset($_POST['url']) === true && is_string($_POST['url']) === true && empty($_POST['url']) === false) {
00054     $url = (string)$_POST['url'];
00055     $md5 = md5($url);
00056   } elseif (isset($_POST['content']) === true && is_string($_POST['content']) === true && empty($_POST['content']) === false) {
00057     $content = (string)$_POST['content'];
00058     $md5 = md5($content);
00059   }
00060   
00061   if ($md5 === null) {
00062     $response->sendCallError('URL ou contenu manquant');
00063   }
00064   
00065   // Start print to PDF : get an older print if it exists
00066   try {
00067     $api_print = ApiPrint::retrieveByUserAndMd5($api_user, $md5);
00068   } catch (Exception $e) {
00069     $response->sendCallError('Impossible to get content');
00070   }
00071   
00072   // New print...
00073   if ($api_print === null) {
00074     $api_print = new ApiPrint();
00075     $api_print->setIdUser($api_user->getId());
00076     if ($url !== null) {
00077       $api_print->setUrl($url);
00078     } elseif ($content !== null) {
00079       $api_print->setContent($content);
00080     } else {
00081       $response->sendDisastrousError('Logical error : no content, no url');
00082     }
00083     $api_print->setMd5($md5);
00084     $api_print->setNb(0);
00085   }
00086   
00087   // Print to PDF
00088   try {
00089     // Check the options
00090     if (isset($_POST['options']) === true && is_array($_POST['options']) === true) {
00091       $options = $_POST['options'];
00092     }
00093     
00094     $pdf = $api_print->printPage($options);
00095     $api_print->save();
00096   } catch (Exception $e) {
00097     $response->sendTransformError($e->getMessage());
00098   }
00099   
00100   // Send PDF
00101   $response->setContent($pdf, true);
00102   $response->setDownloadHeader('transform.pdf');
00103   $response->send();
00104   
00105 } catch (Exception $e) {
00106   if (DEBUG) {
00107     $response->sendDisastrousError($e->getMessage());
00108   } else {
00109     $response->sendDisastrousError();
00110   }
00111 }
